ingredients: Spaghetti, bacon, eggs, Parmesan cheese, black pepper
directions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a skillet, cook bacon until crispy, then set aside.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
Drain spaghetti and immediately toss with egg mixture until well-coated.
Crumble bacon on top and serve hot.

ingredients: Fettuccine pasta, chicken breast, heavy cream, garlic, Parmesan cheese, butter
directions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions.
In a skillet, cook diced chicken breast until no longer pink.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and simmer until slightly thickened.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and cooked pasta until well-combined.
Serve hot with a sprinkle of parsley.

ingredients: Assorted vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas), tofu (optional), soy sauce, ginger, garlic, sesame oil
directions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or skillet over high heat.
Add diced tofu (if using) and stir-fry until golden brown.
Add sliced vegetables, minced ginger, and garlic, and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Drizzle soy sauce over the vegetables and toss to combine.
Serve hot as a side dish or over cooked rice.

ingredients: Pizza dough, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni slices, bell peppers, mushrooms, onions
directions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface and transfer to a greased baking sheet.
Spread marinara sauce evenly over the dough.
Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Add desired toppings such as pepperoni, sliced bell peppers, mushrooms, and onions.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly.
Slice and serve hot.

ingredients: All-purpose flour, butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips
directions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a mixing bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until smooth.
Beat in eggs, one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until well-combined.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop dough by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake in preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until edges are lightly golden.
Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
